remarks: Value of the greatest lower bound function of a poset.  Out-of-domain arguments (those not satisfying ` S e. dom U ` ) are allowed for convenience, evaluating to the empty set on both sides of the equality. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 9-Sep-2018.)
statement:
glbval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
glbval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
glbval.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
glbval.p $e |- ( ps <-> ( A. y e. S x .<_ y /\ A. z e. B ( A. y e. S z .<_ y -> z .<_ x ) ) ) $.
glbva.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
glbval.ss $e |- ( ph -> S C_ B ) $.
glbval $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` S ) = ( iota_ x e. B ps ) ) $.
$d B x z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
